title: Being There (1979) 720p a.k.a Mister Chance - Peter Sellers
description:
How was this file made:

1. Downloaded the smallest (1.9 GB) HD rip (YIFY)
2. Opened it in Avidemux
3. Selected video output to be MPEG4 AVC (X264), Two Pass, 600MB target video size* 
4. Selected audio to be AAC (Faac), 56 kbit/s, Remix Stereo**
5. Video filter swfResize, Lock aspect ratio, Width: 1280, Round to the nearest...
6. Video filter Msharpen, High Q, Treshold: 10, Strenght: 255***
7. Selected output format to be MKV**** and saved it
8. Waited 24 hours (Video filters double up the encoding time)

___________________________________________________________________________________

* This film has very little motion. You gotta draw a line somewhere. Mine is 700MB

** Some movies have multiple channel audio that makes the final size too big

*** The original picture was very dull and boring. I had to sharpen it a little

**** Avidemux can tell you it can't save the audio in MP4 container after you already waited a few hours for the first pass. Good thing Avidemux can save files in diferent containers quickly and without resampling the video / audio. Many movies that my TV refused to play were fixed by changing the container from MP4 to MKV or even MKV to MKV
